tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE regulatory_report (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_name VARCHAR(255),
    report_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE report_data (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_id INT,
    data VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE report_view (
    view_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_id INT,
    view_name VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE regulatory_reports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_name VARCHAR(255),
  report_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE regulatory_fields (
  field_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  field_name VARCHAR(255),
  data_type VARCHAR(50),
  is_required BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE regulatory_rules (
  rule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  rule_name VARCHAR(255),
  rule_description TEXT,
  rule_condition TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE regulatory_views (
  view_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  view_name VARCHAR(255),
  view_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE regulatory_report (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  regulatory_type VARCHAR(50),
  report_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE regulatory_entity (
  entity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  entity_name VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE regulatory_data (
  data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_id INT,
  entity_id INT,
  data_value DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE regulatory_view (
  view_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  view_name VARCHAR(50),
  view_sql TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE regulatory_view_mapping (
  mapping_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  view_id INT,
  data_id INT,
  mapping_description TEXT
)
